title: (x) Ballarat oblique bold slab sans - Futura Condensed {Reed Reibstein}
content:
Have tried Gills Sans, Futura, Arial

[http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/a3/a3b386a1753f4139bc0733c6f7174a...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123401/http:/wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/a3/a3b386a1753f4139bc0733c6f7174a32.10455.jpeg "http://wtf2.myfonts.com/uploads/images/a3/a3b386a1753f4139bc0733c6f7174a32.10455.jpeg")

Any help would be great
author: TF22Raptor

comments.content: Looks like an artificially condensed and perhaps slanted [Futura Condensed Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202123401/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/futura/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D131%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DBALLARAT%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D%26seed%3D20).
